attributes.action: Change the law to ensure only low noise fireworks are sold to the public
attributes.additional_details: Adjust the law on the sale of fireworks to the general public to ensure that only low noise fireworks are available.
attributes.background: Loud fireworks can be the cause of large amounts of stress to people and animals. From small children to adults with certain conditions that are sensitive to aggressive, loud noises do not enjoy these fireworks but low noise variants could provide a happy middle ground.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition which calls for the same action: 

Ban the sale of all non-silent fireworks: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/649354
